Text:
Thank You CP been waiting for this one; Some sort of legal problems with cartoon network and DC animated division over rights of some of the characters; would hate to find out that this show gets cancelled; its the BEST show out right now and I know we all want MORE..Your the always the fastest one to get YJ up....would love it if we could get it the same day; but a big THANK YOU anyhow. 
Anyway for 480p or 720p to get uploaded just as quickly?
Thanks man, I'll be waiting patiently for GLTAS.
Big time thanks....any chance for the new episode of TMNT?
Is there going to be an HD release?
Horrible quality as usual from cp

bitternugget: Sorry but we don't have any that can capture it in HD.

J-RedtheRed: No, they only air a heavily cropped version. They took the 16:9 and cropped it down to 4:3 so we dropped that cartoon for now. :(

Awesome {C_P}, many thanks for uploading.

Excellent quality as usual. Was starting to worry this show wouldn't come back to air.

Cheers
My 3 yr old and myself thank you.
Why does it look like the top and the bottom is chopped off? Like it was poorly cropped?
